title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Metacognition-Based Scientific Problem-Solving and Self-Awareness Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners apply metacognitive strategies (plan-monitor-evaluate) with over 80% accuracy to structure problem-solving processes when analyzing complex scientific issues
Learners identify at least three of their own science learning patterns and develop improvement plans through weekly reflective journals
Learners analyze peers' problem-solving processes for over 10 minutes using metacognition-based questions (Why-What-How framework) during peer feedback sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
